attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I want a many people to sign a petition for the Abolition of the British Monarchy, to favour a more Democratic and Fair Alternative. The people of this great nation deserve a referendum on this issue, a Republican System of Government is more addiquate for the 21st Century where everyone is equal before the Law and where no one is above the Rule of Law. This present system is archaic, undemocratic, none meritocratic and cleary represents sectariansim in terms of the Law of accession. The country needs a more a equal, fair, more transparrent form of Government and Constitution. I hope this matter should dealt with by the will of the honest "PEOPLE" of this Great Nation of ours.....

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name.
